commands.description: Checks the file reputation of the specified hash.
commands.name: file

commands.description: Checks the reputation of an IP address.
commands.name: ip

commands.description: Checks the reputation of a URL.
commands.name: url

commands.description: Checks the reputation of a domain.
commands.name: domain

commands.description: Re-scans an already submitted file. This avoids having to upload the file again.
commands.name: file-rescan

commands.description: Adds comments to files and URLs.
commands.name: vt-comments-add

commands.description: Private API. Get a special URL for files larger than 32 MB.
commands.name: vt-file-scan-upload-url

commands.description: Private API. Retrieves comments for a given resource.
commands.name: vt-comments-get

integration.description: Analyze suspicious hashes, URLs, domains and IP addresses
integration.name: VirusTotal

playbook.description: Detonate one or more files using the VirusTotal integration. This playbook returns relevant reports to the War Room and file reputations to the context data.
playbook.name: Detonate File - VirusTotal

description: Analyze suspicious hashes, URLs, domains and IP addresses
name: VirusTotal
